_aLatestUpdates._sText:
- fixed issue with 2 accidentally deleted models in css4, which may or may not have been prone to crashes

- fixed issue with the falldown-checkpoint potentially teleporting you inside of ladder tiles, making you stuck

- fixed issue with the falldown-checkpoint potentially teleporting you inside of lowgrav tiles, only to fall down again

- fixed issue where the wind crystal could push invincible zombies (no context-filters in CSS caused this, worked around with a vscript-based push)

- the map no longer sets ignitelifetime -1 on round-start, which seems to have ignited spectating players

- increased the pizzadoom event hp a bit (from 1000 to 1200)

- added two damage-multiplier variables for optional server balancing (::HURTPLAYER_mult_ct and ::HURTPLAYER_mult_t)

- the human who shoots down the kamikaze plane will now get proper kill credit from the pilot

- player kills will now give +1 persisting score, so each stage-win is now defined in the 100's, and the rest is your kill-count

- the item-button filter added in css4 will now block E-presses until the doors start opening, to avoid confusion

- reverted the auto-slay on the finale elevator for the time being, locked behind the variable: 'finale_elevator_autoslay_enable = false'

- added logic to deny general round wins if it was from a solo, no solorats allowed, go for the team win

- the bloodlust event will now reset the human-delay timer, to prevent z-invincibility from enabling by forced overdefending

- the ascend ending will now flash with less alpha/intensity to make it easier on the eyes

- the infinite finale run colorcorrection should no longer stay stuck now

- you will no longer receive falldamage if landing just next to an airslide-tile

- lowered the top of ladders by 2 units in hopes of preventing weird boost-jank

- fixed issue where the race ending doesn't start

- blocked stage #1673322993 from running during the finale

- finale boss platform tiles now have improved lighting

- collapsing tiles will now use the proper/same lighting information as its original tile

- if servers are using forced playermodel (::CHEAP_PLAYERMODELS) the rendercolor is now forced to white (255,255,255)

- tweaked airslide tiles in order to make them more responsive and stable

- tweaked boostpad tiles in order to make them more responsive and stable

- tweaked teleport tiles in order to make them more responsive and stable

- lowered z-stone item trigger bounds to its original size (from 20 to 5)

- the weapon_jam event now gives more reserve ammo in hopes of not depleting the ammo entirely

- made the conflict ending crouch-jump work better, now you'll jump high as long as you hold CTRL while you jump (instead having to wait to become crouched)

- added a game_text to show the mapID/mapname/author next to the stage pixel-preview on the upper left

- added a mirrored variant of the stage pixel-preview on the upper left

- the stage pixel-preview is now rotated 90 degrees counter-clockwise (making it relative to the entrance-direction)

- altered the format of the stage pixel-preview .vtf files to remove bleeding/color artifacts (thanks ficool)

- certain items that may cause a player to fall off the stage will now give killcredit for falldamage-deaths

- certain items that may cause a player to fall off the stage will now give killcredit for harsh hazplane-deaths

- added extra item-button filter which will now deny using items if you're close to and looking towards an E-press door or a button tile

- added logic to auto-slay early on during the finale elevator if the human number is too low, saving time

- added logic to auto-slay during the finale final elevator, if the human number is too low, no solorats allowed, go for the team win

_sText:
ze_collective


[Join the collective]
1) Visit:   Luffaren.com/ze_collective
2) Draw a 20x20 image via the web-editor
3) Submit the 20x20 image to the web
4) Luffaren reviews all submitted images
5) Accepted images get added to the map

[This map includes]
- YOUR pixel-levels (1000+ and expanding)
- Themes
- Items
- Traps
- Events
- 5 stages (4 difficulties, 1 finale)
- A bossfight with an exciting ending
- Infinite mode (when map is beaten)

Admin room: (visible just above spawn)

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
To win the map:
- Complete the 4 difficulties + their respective endings.
- Complete the finale + its ending.
- Complete the infinite finale + its ending (the higher the stage/check-out count, the better).

The stage/check-out count will be what separates men from boys. 
Which team will be able to go the furthest?

Good luck!
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This CS:S port was made possible thanks to the recent update which implemented Vscript into the game.

Please do not alter or port this map elsewhere, thank you!

Huge thanks to Ficool and Xen for helping out with a bunch of technical issues that came with the CS:S port!
